constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 将一个矩形分割成恰好 n 个部分
constraints.formal: 将一个矩形通过水平和垂直切割分成 n 个部分

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 最小化切割次数以达到目标
constraints.formal: minimize(h + v) such that (h + 1) * (v + 1) = n, where h is the number of horizontal cuts and v is the number of vertical cuts
